tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GMO_Nutritional_Information (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  calories DECIMAL,
  protein DECIMAL,
  carbohydrates DECIMAL,
  fats DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE GMO_Nutritional_Information (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  calories FLOAT NOT NULL,
  protein FLOAT,
  carbohydrates FLOAT,
  fats FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE NutritionalInformation (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  gmo_id INT NOT NULL,
  calories INT,
  protein DECIMAL(5,2),
  carbohydrates DECIMAL(5,2),
  fats DECIMAL(5,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (gmo_id) REFERENCES GMOs(id)
);

CREATE TABLE GMOs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    calories FLOAT,
    proteins FLOAT,
    fats FLOAT,
    carbohydrates FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE gm_food (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    calories INT NOT NULL,
    protein DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE gm_ingredients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    source VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    modified_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL
);
